com.palantir.curatortestrule

Class ZooKeeperRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • com.palantir.curatortestrule.ZooKeeperRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalZooKeeperRule, SharedZooKeeperRule

    public abstract class ZooKeeperRule
extends org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
    JUnit rule to create a zookeeper server and to create curator instances to connect to the zookeeper server. The zookeeper server will be started before the Statement that the rule wraps, and closed after the Statement runs (read the javadoc for the concrete subclasses for caveats when running multiple tests concurrently).

    An open port must be specified when creating the ZooKeeperRule.

    A namespace is used so that in the case that multiple tests are using the same zookeeper server, their operations on the server won't collide. If a namespace is not provided, then a random namespace will be used, NOT the root namespace.

      • getClient

        public org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework getClient(org.apache.curator.RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
        Returns a CuratorFramework with the CuratorFrameworkFactory.Builder.connectString(String) and CuratorFrameworkFactory.Builder.namespace(String) already set. The CuratorFramework will already be started, and will be closed automatically.
